verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARGM-MNR: Tuxedo] - [V: clad] and surrounded [ARG1: by the mainstream media and celebrities] , Donald Trump scowled his way through the 2011 White House Correspondents ' Dinner , ridiculed by President Barack
